column4: I am installing Ubuntu.  It's asking to partition my current hard drive, which has Windows 7 installed.  It's asking me to size the partitions using a slider, but the partitions are not even named!
So I don't know which partition will be which size when I am done.
If you use disk manager in Win7, you can resize the partition there then install to the free space
mine is about 4Gb here, giving ubuntu about 15Gb is plenty :)
